about_the_game:
THIS IS THE DEMO OF RESTAURANT BUILDER

✔️Mighty Power washer
✔️Unstoppable Jackhammer
✔️Handy-dandy spray gun
✔️Determination, creativity, and will

Be the boss, be the builder, be the manager… be yourself.
Equipped with a high-pressure washer, jackhammer, and a highly addictive spray gun, you face the construction of a restaurant the world has never seen. Tear down walls, build, destroy, paint, and decorate, utilizing real physics, and dynamic lighting to bring empty space to life. Restore empty places, renovate items in need, fix what needs to be fixed, paint, decorate, build, destroy, think, and act. All this you’ll find in Restaurant Builder.

Building a restaurant needs a lot of work, but it is quite rewarding and relaxing. The game is divided into 3 phases. The first phase is cleaning, selling, washing, and repairing. The second is the creation stage. Buying furniture, arranging, painting, decorating. The third is the opening or sale phase. You can sell the restaurant and create another one, or open it by hiring a team and inviting customers. YOU manage it all.

KEY FEATURES

🔨Super relaxing mechanics of painting walls with a spray gun
🔨Realistic demolition mechanics of tearing down walls into fragments with a jackhammer
🔨Fully dynamic lighting with day and night cycle
🔨Ability to renovate objects, colors of objects, and lights
🔨Players' beloved powerwash cleaner, utilizing the real physics of items
🔨An extensive task system that allows for a different order of execution
🔨Dozen of components for decorations and building awaits to be found, sold or bought
🔨Building walls, doors, windows with covering, floors, walls, and ceilings with various materials


BUILD TO CREATE PERFECTION

Feel the spirit of work within you, because quite a lot of effort is waiting for you. You will also have to move your head. Nothing will come up on its own. Put up doors, bricklayer, paint, tile, and much more

DARE TO REPAIR

Learn one of Murphy's laws. What can go wrong? It's bound to break. Also, don't count on luck. Doors, windows, repaired doors, electronic equipment, lighting and much more will need repair. However, you will be rewarded with the end result. Well, and great music from the repaired jukebox.

DECORATE TO BUILD ATMOSPHERE

What is the most important thing in a restaurant? Atmosphere. Here only your creativity will be the limit. Choose the colors, place the objects, adjust the lighting, and hang the pictures. Light candles to add a touch of romance. Play with your freedom of choice.

DESTROY TO MAKE IT BETTER

Before you create something, you must first tear it down. Heavy equipment awaits in your hands to knock down walls, doors, floors, and windows. Smash everything. And put it up from scratch.

TIME TO LEAN, TIME TO CLEAN

If you enter long-unoccupied rooms then they must be dirty. It's a good thing you have nimble hands, a pressure washer at hand, and no lack of determination. Let us hear "this house is clean" once again! Remove dirt, get rid of the trash, mop floors, vacuum dusty items

CASH IS THE KING

Money never sleeps. Adjust to the situation. Earn $ by selling unwanted items. Some of the can be worth more than others. Be sure not to sell too much, as everything can be useful in decorating your restaurant. You will earn a lot more by accepting various types of assignments. You can use the cash you earn to buy the necessary materials to finish your restaurant.

NEVER GET BORED

There are a lot of ruined and forgotten interiors that are waiting to be rediscovered. It's up to you to get to know them all.

RUN RESTAURANT- A good restaurant means a lot of customers, good waiters, and tasty food. Attract customers, hire a crew, and when you get bored, sell it all and start over.
